name: EarthBound Omega
description:
IMPORTANT: An install of a special version of DirectX is required to play this game. You can get it here. https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/confirmation.aspx?id=35 (Unless you have already installed it.)

When a boy wakes up one night from a commotion outdoors, he soon discovers the strange power of PSI, his cousin even saying that he is the "Chosen One" and he will save the world from the impending doom of the evil Psiborgs, a threat to the world itself. Teaming up with his three friends, he will defeat the evil power and save the universe. When you have faith, you can accomplish anything!
Based on the EarthBound/MOTHER series by Shigesato Itoi and HAL Labs. I do not own the EarthBound name, music, or any other EarthBound/MOTHER series related assets.

The demo goes up to the end of Chapter 7, which should offer around 6 or 7 hours of gameplay.

Check out the Discord! https://discord.gg/n28f5FA
